Xebecs have a history of being corsair ships and they were often seen in the Mediterranean .历史上它们常被作为海盗船只并且频繁的在地中海一带活动。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French corsaire, from medieval Latin cursarius, from cursus 'a raid, plunder', special use of Latin cursus 'course', from currere 'to run'

means.word_mean: 1. a pirate along the Barbary coast
2. a swift pirate ship (often operating with official sanction)
